  # Comment the next line if you don't want to use dynamic frameworks
  use_frameworks!
  
  # Pods for ProjectName
  
  target 'Tests' do
    inherit! :search_paths
    # Pods for testing
  end

  target 'UITests' do
    inherit! :search_paths
    # Pods for testing
  end

end
